title: Unchained
description: Revenge will bring them together, but lust will be their undoing.  A powerful lord, emotionally scarred by his past and determined to never again give in to his sexual desires.  A world (and cock) weary madam who knows all too well how easy it is for cruel men to hurt the ones they claim to love.  A dark regency story of love, lust, revenge and murder with two very unconventional people.  Please be aware that this book contains things some readers may find difficult. Past rape, violent sex, BDSM, kink, bisexuality, prostitution, and psychological trauma. This is the first in a series and has an HEA (believe it or not).
author: Caroline Hanson
